0.5.name: wordpress/personalized-chuck-norris-joke-widget
0.5.description: This plugin adds a small Wordpress widget that shows a random personalized Chuck Norris joke on your blog, starring yourself. These jokes are taken from a database on icndb.com. For regular Chuck Norris jokes, please refer to the Chuck Norris Jokes Widget.
